channel.title: Editing gameframe
channel.description:
Okay, I have edited my gameframe and used 317 sprites. I have encountered a few errors that i do not have a clue how to fix. to the right of the minimap are numbers where the orbs use to be, just below the minimap and at the top there are transparent spots, and the very obvious black bar where text is suppose to be written. If someone knows how to resolve this problem and can explain to me how i would go about doing this that would be fantastic
-Bebew

item.title: Editing gameframe
item.dc:creator: @Bebew67 Bebew67
item.description:
@Bebew67 wrote:

Sorry, are you talking about the location like.
Or client.java file because i did not go anywhere near that i literally replace the .png files with the ones i wanted

Read full topic

item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“Bebew67, post:6, topic:450199”]I am using delta 317 client
client>>Files>>Sprites That is where i added the sprites pretty sure that is what you wanted?[/quote]

right but where in the client files

item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Bebew67:

How do you change the location of your sprite i just put the sprites? i wanted to use in my sprites folder in my client and replaced them with the old ones.

show me where you added the sprites, and what client are you using
